title: Interpretation of Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream and hearing Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the Throne Verse Listening to a recitation of the Qur’an written on a recitation paper Memorization for an unmarried girl For a married woman For a pregnant man Or a divorced or unmarried For a man Ibn Sirin For Imam Al-Sadiq and others The Throne Verse in a dream, one of the most beautiful dreams that we see in a dream in a different way, it strikes the dreamer with a state of happiness and joy if he sees it, as we see that through reading. The Throne Verse in a dream or that we see someone reading the Throne Verse in a dream, which must be fully interpreted because the Throne Verse is the heart of the Qur’an that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said, Our Master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, called us to read it constantly. Imam Ibn Sirin, the great and famous interpreter of dreams, explained to us in his interpretations many meanings and connotations of seeing the Throne Verse in a dream in all circumstances, which we will present to you in full. Interpretation of the Throne Verse in a dream The Throne Verse: The seer gains prestige and holiness Ibn Sirin says that if someone sees in a dream that he is memorizing the Throne Verse, this means that this person is intelligent and has a lot of intelligence. - The chair in a group of people indicates that this person is free from diseases and enjoys great safety. If one sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Baqarah and with it Ayat Al-Kursi, this means that this person will be blessed by God with useful knowledge and will have a long and righteous life in this world. But if he sees that he is reading only part of it, this indicates that this person and his son have escaped from a problem. As for if a person sees in a dream that he is reading Ayat al-Kursi and part of Surat al-Baqarah, this means that this inheritance will be inherited between him and his relatives. Interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing Surat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of safety and security in life. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of goodness and blessing in a person’s life. Seeing a patient lying on a chair in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of achieving aspirations. Reciting Surat al-Baqarah in a dream is evidence of abundant livelihood in the dreamer’s life. Hearing Surat al-Baqarah in full or one of its parts in a dream is evidence of longevity and the dreamer’s righteousness in life. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of protection from evil for the dreamer. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is the verse of healing from illness and disease. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of achieving dreams, security in religion, and immunity from evil. Seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence that he is a person looking for good. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence that a person is approaching God and that God has saved him from Some worries and problems. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream and repeating it after him is evidence of marriage to a religious man. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of the good that will come her way. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness and an end to problems. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of great memorization and intelligence of a person. Seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of monotheism in God.

Hearing Surat Al-Baqarah in full or one of its parts in a dream is evidence of longevity and the dreamer’s integrity in life. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of protection from evil for the dreamer. Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream is a verse of healing from Sickness and illness. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of dreams, security in religion, and immunity from evil. Seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence that he is a person searching for goodness. Reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence that a person is approaching God and that God has saved him from some worries. And problems. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream and repeating it behind her is evidence of marriage to a religious man. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of the good that is coming her way. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of recovery. From diseases and an end to problems. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of great memorization and intelligence for a person. Seeing Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream is evidence of monotheism in God.

title: Interpretation of a cockroach in a dream

preview.html: Dear reader, through our article today, we will present to you the interpretation of a cockroach in a dream. Resorting to experts to know the meanings of their dreams and seeing a cockroach in a dream can create some questions in your mind through the following lines in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a cockroach in a dream Cockroaches in a dream symbolize the enemy or hypocrites around the dreamer, and killing a cockroach in a dream indicates the approaching elimination of enemies and achieving success. Dream interpretations generally vary according to the dreamer. It has its own meaning, and this is what we will tell you in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about a dead cockroach If one sees a dead cockroach in his dream, this means that there are some people trying to obstruct the dreamer from achieving his goals. This vision can come as good news about the imminent elimination of problems in the dreamer's life. And when one sees in his dream that he is killing a cockroach, this vision indicates that this person will get rid of his bad habits. Flying cockroach in a dream Seeing a flying cockroach in a dream indicates the presence of negative influences around the person that must be paid attention to. It can also be considered a symbol of fears in the dreamer's life that he cannot confront. Eating cockroaches in a dream If one sees in his dream that one of his acquaintances is eating a cockroach, this means that this person practices hateful habits that lead him to contract a disease, whether in the mind or body. If one sees himself eating from a plate containing a cockroach, this indicates that there are people in the dreamer's life who hate his superiority and success and are trying to destroy him, so the visionary in this case must pay attention to those around him. Cockroach A bird in a single woman's dream If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is trying to kill a cockroach, this is good news to get rid of her enemies. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a cockroach is approaching her, this means that there are those around her. If an unmarried woman sees a cockroach moving in her dream, this means that this girl will leave her lover. A single woman's vision of a flying cockroach indicates that there are concerns in this girl's life. Seeing a cockroach in a single woman's dream is an indication of her need to modify one of her life behaviors. For example, seeing a cockroach flying and heading towards the kitchen means that the dreamer should direct his attention to the food he is eating. An unmarried woman who sees a cockroach in her bed may indicate that she is affected by magic or that the evil eye is watching her. Seeing cockroaches in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees a cockroach in a dream symbolizes problems between her and her husband. A married woman’s vision of killing a cockroach indicates that she is trying to get rid of her enemies or get rid of one of her negative habits. If a married woman sees black cockroaches in her dream, this means that there are differences between her and her husband and that these differences will develop. When a married woman sees in her dream that a cockroach is touching her, this symbolizes the woman’s envy or suggests that she is affected by magic. Interpretation of seeing a cockroach for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees a large number of cockroaches in her dream, this symbolizes that she will face many problems that will

title: Interpretation of seeing a keyhole in a dream

preview.html: Peeking into a dream SpyThe gap The door is a sign that he has betrayed someone he trusts. The vision symbolizes the presence of friends acting around the dreamer. Seeing yourself looking through a hole in a dream warns that you are unintentionally hurting someone. Hole door in a dreamIf the dreamer sees that the door of his house is broken, this is a warning not to Telling others their personal secrets. Seeing a woman warns a married woman. Others are following her news with her husband and trying to ruin their relationship together. The vision indicates the need to think about correcting many things that the dreamer does by accident. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a house key in a dream. Cutting a key in a dream, warns of Something unpleasant will happen to the pioneer. The vision shows the obstacles that hinder the dreamer from achieving his goals. The vision portends a delay in answering prayers, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a key and a door in a dream: The vision indicates the necessity of making the right decision to succeed in work. The vision shows good luck for the dreamer and also expresses important opportunities Which he gets. The vision symbolizes the easy solution to all problems. To open a door with a key in a dream is a sign of kindness and livelihood that fills the house. An unmarried woman’s dream is a promise of the approaching date of her engagement. Interpretation of a dream about a key for a married woman. Seeing her holding the key well in a married woman’s dream indicates stability. Her family life and the success of her relationship with her husband. Finding a key in a dream is a sign of moving to a new house or buying a car. In a married woman’s dream, the key symbolizes her good behavior among people and her great position in their hearts. Holding the key indicates that she feels comfortable and confident with her husband. Giving the key to someone What is in a dream is an indication of the livelihood and kindness of an unmarried woman. If a married woman sees that her husband gives her a key in a dream, this indicates the stability of her financial situation. Interpretation of a dream looking through a peephole: looking for small eyes that announces the bad character of those who see them. The vision shows the dreamer’s love for knowing the secrets of others Seeing people looking through a peephole indicates that people are trying to follow his news and reveal his secrets. Interpretation of a dream about a key for individuals: A girl who gets a key in a dream indicates a change in her situation for the better. The vision indicates a new stage, making friends and learning many cultures. After Therefore, seeing the search for a key in a single woman’s dream symbolizes her desire to get out of the circle that limits her. The vision indicates the remarkable progress that the girl has achieved, whether in study or at work. Damn you. A new key in a dream heralds the marriage of an unmarried woman and moving into her home with Her husband. After that, seeing an iron key in a dream indicates marriage to a man who will give her the support she needs to advance at work. Finding a golden key in a dream portends marriage to a wealthy young man. Interpretation of a dream about breaking a key: Seeing a broken key in a dream means that you are suffering from problems and hearing bad news. Then the vision symbolizes breaking the heart of a close person. The vision warns of the pregnant woman’s mistreatment of things that she should take well.

title: The meaning of the name Ali in a dream for major scholars

preview.html: The name Ali in a dream is one of the beautiful names that made the vision all worthy of praise, and this was revealed through the interpretations provided by the leading interpreters and scholars to clarify the meanings of this vision with all the symbols it contains, with the exception of a few very simple cases in which they purified unwanted meanings arising from the symbols. That appeared in the vision, and through the article we will convey these meanings to you so that you can think about them well and understand what they indicate. The name Ali in a dream It has been said by some scholars who agreed that the name Ali is one of the names that indicates that whoever sees it is distinguished by height and sublimity, It is an indication of the great status that he will have in the future. The name Ali indicates the abundant good that the dreamer will receive in the future if he talks to a person named Ali in a dream. If the dreamer sees in his dream the name Ali written on the wall in front of him with light, then the dream indicates greatness. And the beautiful position that he enjoys among those around him, his fame, and the world’s love for him. The name Ali in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the name Ali in a dream is a sign of victory over enemies and undermining them and the ability to obtain the right, in the event that the dreamer is named Ali. If the dreamer sees that he is named A young child with the name Ali, this indicates the right choices that this person always makes, which lead him to the right path, the path of rise and elevation. Seeing Ali’s name written on the bed with light indicates the good deeds that this person performs and that he is known with great dignity among those around him. And by doing more good deeds, he will reach a situation that he never imagined. The name Ali in a dream for single people. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is called Ali, this means that she has a great status and high morals that distinguish her and her fame around her and that she will soon reach her dreams. In the event that she is the Virgin Lady You talk to a young man in a dream named Ali, it means that he will marry someone who has a high status and position among those around him, and can earn money from legitimate sources, and even live happily and contentedly. The name Ali in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to a child named Ali, this means a bright future with her husband and that she will reach a level of life with him that she has not yet imagined. If a married woman is named Ali in her dream, this indicates her great status with her husband, which she enjoys with him, and the state of stability that she sees in her life with him. If a woman sees A married woman dreams that she calls her husband by the name Ali, and his name is not that in reality. This indicates that she respects him very much, and a dream about him is a sign of stability and happiness. Between the wife. The name Ali in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman finds in her dream that she has given birth to a child named Ali, this indicates the ease of childbirth through which she will give birth to a child who will be her support and help in the future and she will be very happy. He - She. In the dream of a pregnant woman who names a child in a dream that was not her child, Ali is considered a sign of the wonderful status she enjoys among those around her, Net

title: Interpretation of a dream about running on the road

preview.html: It also varies according to the social status of the viewer, and from the translator’s website, the largest interpretation of dreams in the world, we will talk about the interpretation in detail. Follow us. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road in a dream for a single girl. If the unmarried woman in her dream is the one who follows a person in a dream and manages to catch him. In fact, the vision indicates the pursuit of goals in life, and this is a sign of achieving what she wants. If the unmarried woman runs In her dream, imaginary creatures such as a monster or an unknown thing are behind her. This symbolizes success, academic excellence, and victory over enemies, God willing. But if the girl is the one who runs quickly from someone chasing her in the dream, this is an indication of stumbling in some aspects of life in studies, whether she is a student or In her work as a result of lack of interest. The lion or bull running after the single man on the road. It indicates that there is someone thinking about marrying the person who had the vision. And if the unmarried girl runs away for fear of many people who will overtake her in the dream. This indicates that she is jealous of those close to her who are waiting for her, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees herself chasing a young man she knows in reality, the dream indicates her love for that young man and that she would like to communicate with him. See also: Interpretation of running away in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of watching a dream of running in the street in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is running in fear Being chased by something, this indicates a lack of money. But if a married woman rushes after something, the dream indicates that God will alleviate her distress, God willing. And if the woman is part of a running team in a race and she is able to take first place. The vision appears That she is a woman who takes care of her household affairs and takes care of her husband and children. This may indicate her success in her work. And if a married woman has a sick son in reality, and she sees that he is running fast in a dream. The dream indicates that the illness will be dangerous for her son, which will prompt her to run away with her son. To receive treatment. In general, you may see yourself running away from something or someone quickly and fearfully in a married woman’s dream. This indicates that she is suffering from an obsessive fear of the illness or death of one of her children or a member of her family, and God knows best. But if the dreamer is sick in reality and sees In the dream that she is running, the vision portends the elimination of her illness. What if a woman saw that she was running briskly and lightly in her dream, and that her married life was unstable in reality. The dream indicates the end of her problems with her husband and the restoration of peace and stability in her life again, God willing. If she feels very tired while running, this indicates some difficulties she faces in her life. Read also: Walking on water in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of running in the street in a dream about the man and its meaning. If a person sees himself in a dream running on the road, then he falls to the ground and is in pain. And this It indicates that he is already going through some problems and crises that will affect his life for some time. And if the dreamer sees that he is running quickly for fear of someone or something in his dream. The dream shows the fear of losing something...

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person watering crops in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dead plants watered in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of seeing dead plants watered in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil. The reality of the dream and its interpretation is good, and it is the jurisprudence of scholars. The interpretation of seeing a dead plant watering crops in a dream is a dream place. If the deceased is watering the plants and his appearance is beautiful, it may indicate that the dreamer has achieved his goals and aspirations in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was watering the plants may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in the dream That the deceased was watering the plants, may indicate the high position that the dreamer will reach in those days by God’s grace. And dreaming of the dead person watering the plants in a dream may indicate the good things that the deceased left for his family and that he helped them a lot at that time, and God knows best. The dream of a dead person dying again, and there were shouts and screams that could indicate a problem that a family member fell into during this time, and God knows best. If we see the death of a deceased person in a dream, this may indicate a health problem that the dreamer or a member of his family may face during those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person mourns the death of the deceased again in a dream, this may indicate a crisis that the dreamer was facing in those days. And God knows best. In the event that a person sees that the deceased has torn the clothes, this may indicate the suffering that The dreamer suffered from it a lot in those days. Dreaming of a dead person whose clothes were torn in a dream may indicate bad events that the dreamer may face in his life in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that the dead person has torn his clothes may indicate the severing of family ties in those days. And God knows best. The interpretation of seeing a dead person in wet clothes in a dream. Seeing dead people in wet clothes in a dream may indicate the dead person’s need for prayer and zakat at that time, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased’s clothes are wet with water could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer in his life. And God knows best. It is possible that seeing a dead person’s wet clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer great difficulties and crises in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person paralyzed in a dream: If one sees a dead person paralyzed in a dream, this could be a warning sign for the dreamer. Regarding the bad deeds he commits. It is possible that seeing a paralyzed father in a dream indicates his son’s misbehavior and he stops him and repents to God the Most High and Blessed. A dead person being paralyzed in a dream could indicate that the dreamer has been afflicted with some health problems and obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this time. And God knows best. Whoever dreams of the paralysis of a deceased person may indicate...

title: What is the interpretation of washing the face in a dream for a single, divorced or married woman?

preview.html: Here, dear reader, is the interpretation of washing one’s face in a dream in detail for different occasions, as washing one’s face is the first thing a person does after waking up from deep anxiety in order to start a new beginning on a day full of activity and vitality. In terms of vitality, what are the interpretations that come from washing the face with rain water for single and divorced women? It is believed in particular that these visions are signs from God Almighty guiding them to the straight path, according to what was mentioned in Surat Yusuf, peace be upon him, in the Holy Qur’an about dreams, while another group found that Dreams are simply that. It refers to dreams that do not refer to anything in reality. Rather, it is merely a liberation from the mind and awareness, and this is explained through an encyclopedia, the most prominent interpretations that came from seeing the blue pen in a dream in dream interpretation books, so follow us. The dream of washing the face in the dream means: changing conditions for the better by the command of God, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. The dream of washing the face of Good dreams that indicate the end of some people’s suffering from debts and financial difficulties, and God knows best. To see yourself washing your face in a dream explains the end of the period of successive worries and troubles that entered the life of the dreamer, and God knows the clouds. Seeing yourself washing your face symbolizes material gains. Which the dreamer achieves in reality or progress, and God knows best. Seeing washing your face in a dream suggests to the dreamer: getting rid of the problems that follow the dreamer’s path in reality, and God knows the unseen. The interpretations that come with washing the face with water vary depending on the type of water.

title: What is the interpretation of kissing a dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Kissing a dead father in a dream. The loss of a father is considered one of the great events that fill the human heart with pain and anxiety. It is considered one of the greatest misfortunes that occur in life. Longing leads a person to want to see the dead father, and it can truly help him. He appears in a dream and kisses him. What is the interpretation of kissing? Dead father in a dream? We will explain in our article. Kissing a dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Kissing a dead father in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about kissing a dead father indicates many nice and beautiful meanings that make life happier for the viewer, enjoy it and make his circumstances much easier. The son can see his father kissing him in the vision because of his longing for him and his desire to support him. As he did in the past. The dream carries the meaning of the good upbringing of the children and their great obedience to this father and the good deeds that he instilled in them so that they can live their lives in happiness and contentment. Experts say that kissing a dead father has indications that vary depending on the location of the kiss. He is in an excellent position as a result of his kindness. But if you kiss him with intense crying and great sadness, the dreamer is committing some grave sins and mistakes that do not please God and he must get rid of them in order to escape from sin and its evil. While the kiss on the hand of the dead father in the vision carries meanings of love, respect, and gentle treatment. Which the dreamer directs to those around him, others also feel pleasure when they meet him in reality. Kissing the dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many interpretations of the kiss of the dead father came from Ibn Sirin and generally indicate that the topic is evidence of the dreamer’s good upbringing and high morals that this father taught him. It shows The vision is an important indicator of the satisfaction that comes to a person in his life, in addition to being good news for the removal of annoying economic conditions and the expansion of the scope of livelihood, God willing. If a man kisses the head of his deceased father, it is a matter of deep thanks to him for the principles of kindness that he implanted in him and for his good upbringing, which Make him a normal and respected human being around him. And if the dreamer discovers that he kissed the hands of his deceased father, he will be known to those around him for his good reputation, closeness to people, and his love for providing constant help and kindness. And if she hugs him and embraces him tightly while kissing him, then the subject carries happy interpretations that herald the approach of dreams and the fulfillment of many The joyful things that people plan. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Kissing a dead father in a dream for a single woman. Kissing a single woman’s deceased father proves her intense love for him and her endless longing for him despite the passage of time, but she feels lonely and in need of him at all times. If the girl is planning a new job Or a project of her own that she feels anxious about implementing and accepts her father’s vision, so she must start with this thing that she is looking for and feel confident in herself because she is capable of it. He will achieve whatever he wants, God willing. A girl can see this dream while she is in difficult circumstances, because the father is the main supporter

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jacket in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jacket in a dream for single people, and a jacket in a dream indicates the need for comfort and tranquility, as it can indicate wealth and luxury, and wearing a jacket indicates the approaching marriage, whether for a young man. Or a girl.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jacket in a dream, the meaning of a black jacket in a dream for elderly, married and pregnant women, the meaning of a cut jacket, who sees a dead jacket, and the symbol of a wide jacket, and the jacket is called a coat and it is one of the important clothes used to warm a person and protect him from the cold. A long jacket or a blue jacket in a dream will inevitably have many interpretations and meanings that we will discuss, explaining in detail seeing the jacket in a dream. In this article, the dream interpretation of seeing a sweater in a dream is about an ordinary woman. Interpretation of a dream of a sweater in a dream: The interpretation of seeing a sweater in a dream explains the dreamer’s desire and the need to feel reassured and stable. Dreaming of a wool sweater in a dream indicates a good and ample livelihood and a long life. A long jacket in a dream is evidence of excellence in business and a prominent social position. Seeing an expensive jacket in a dream indicates the fulfillment of ambitions, ambitions, and success in what the dreamer seeks to achieve. To dream of seeing a fur jacket in a dream is a desirable vision and evidence of wealth, prosperity, and a decent life. If we dream that we are wearing a jacket, this means marriage, an increase in the number of children, and an increase in livelihood resources in general. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shirt in a dream for a man. Interpretation of seeing a jacket for an ordinary woman: Interpretation of dreams about a new jacket in a dream for a single woman indicates a change in life for the better and achieving what You want it and aspire to it. Seeing an ordinary woman wearing a jacket in a dream is evidence of the approaching date of her engagement and marriage to a suitable person characterized by generosity and good morals. The interpretation of dreaming of a huge jacket in a dream for a woman who is a vessel indicates cover, purity, purity, and closeness to Almighty God. Seeing a jacket in a dream for a woman who is a vessel indicates cover, purity, purity, and closeness to Almighty God. A man in a dream means that she has a strong personality and is able to make fateful decisions in her life on her own. Dreaming of seeing a torn jacket in a dream is a sign of failure in something that could be a study, work, or a failed love story. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing a suit in a dreamInterpretation of a dream Married woman: The interpretation of seeing a white jacket in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she is a good woman and a good and pure soul. Dreaming of buying a jacket in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she lives happily, stably, and quietly with her husband and family. The interpretation of seeing a gift of a jacket from her husband in a dream for a woman Married woman indicates that he seeks in his work to achieve prosperity and a decent life for her. Seeing a yellow jacket in a married woman’s dream can indicate illness or eye injury and envy. The interpretation of dreaming of an old jacket in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she will face many problems and disagreements with her husband. In the coming period. Seeing that she is wearing a tight jacket in a dream means that her secret will be revealed and it may cause her problems

Good news for her pious husband bringing her joy and happiness. And joy. A single girl seeing in a dream that heavy rain enters her house. It means positive changes in her coming life, God willing. These changes could be a connection, a new job, or success in studying. If the rain falls in the form of thunderstorms and thunderstorms, the vision is not good. It indicates that the girl is exposed to worries and sorrows, but they will go away, God willing. An unmarried girl’s dream that it rains blood from her sky is An unpleasant dream shows her many sins and disobedience in reality, and God knows best. The rain that falls on a married woman in her dream indicates that she enjoys contentment and contentment, and God did not divorce her in reality without objection. But if she sees the sky raining blood on her, then the vision means the many sins and misdeeds she will commit in her life. The sky was It rained inside his married home and she was happy about it. It means her victory over her enemies, and that she will hear good news soon, God willing.
